name: NextDay
0:
”Alexa, ask next day when is the next monday”
”Alexa, ask next day on what date is next monday”
”Alexa, open next day”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: next day
des: This skill finds the next occurrence of a given day. E.g. if you want to find on what date is next sunday, you would need to say - "Hello Alexa, ask next day, when is next sunday" and it will answer with the date.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
